fields.Title: INVENTORY / GUM WRAPPER
fields.Description: the chewing gum wrapper you can interact with whether you've messed with the ledger or not

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "There it is again -- the scent of a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There it is again -- the scent of apricots, with a touch of cinnamon. Smells like the end of some distant summer. The surface of another planet, or some ancient temple.

fields.Title: You: "Take a deep, *deep* breath."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take a deep, *deep* breath.

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "The sun sets into the sea, but the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sun sets into the sea, but the water does not boil. Instead it turns to liquid gold. For a moment, the world's store of precious metals seems to increase dramatically, and you are rich...

fields.Title: You: "Ancient temple?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Ancient temple?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You feel compelled to point out tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel compelled to point out that there's nothing fruity about cinnamon -- It's a spice derived from tree bark.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Whatever petrochemical by-products..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever petrochemical by-products they used to create this artificial flavour have bonded tightly to the wrapper. Or is that just your memory, filling in the gaps?

fields.Title: You: "Wait, come back!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, come back!

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "There is a movement next to you. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a movement next to you. The shuffle of a small coat. Warm, like the evening. But when you turn toward it there's nothing there...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You carefully fold the wrapper into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You carefully fold the wrapper into a square, before putting it back into your pocket. Lovingly even -- despite the strange feeling of regret.

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "... until a blossom of skin and flo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... until a blossom of skin and flower petals erupts behind your closed eyes. Made of toffee, cream, and distance. You just *had* to take a dive.

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "Yes. From the height of antiquity...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. From the height of antiquity. A long, long time ago. Millennia ago. On an island of time you can never return to.

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "Bitter, citrus, sweet, it seems to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bitter, citrus, sweet, it seems to grow stronger, like a glow, with every breath you take...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Feels very, very familiar. Harry. P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Feels very, very familiar. Harry. Please. You were supposed to discard it.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Feels so, so familiar."
fields.Dialogue Text: Feels so, so familiar.

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "Why are you talking to a gum wrappe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why are you talking to a gum wrapper?

fields.Title: You: "I'll hang on to it, just in case."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'll hang on to it, just in case.

fields.Title: You: "[Put the wrapper away.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Put the wrapper away.]

fields.Title: You: "End of summer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: End of summer...

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "You neatly fold the wrapper into a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You neatly fold the wrapper into a square before you put it back into your pocket. Carefully. Lovingly even...

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "Good question, There is no answer o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good question, There is no answer or secret phrase written on the inside of the wrapper. Yet you're drawn to it.

fields.Title: You: "Where did it go?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where did it go?

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "A crinkled chewing gum wrapper. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A crinkled chewing gum wrapper. The worn label reads: 'Tutti Frutti.' It smells faintly of apricots, with a barely noticeable twinge of cinnamon.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Drawn by regret. Stop, before you *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drawn by regret. Stop, before you *hurt* yourself with the Tutti Frutti wrapper. Throw it away, please.

fields.Title: Apricot Chewing Gum Wrapper: "Can a used wrapper shrug? It seems..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can a used wrapper shrug? It seems like that's what the wrapper is doing, somehow. This is not about flowers, or bark? What *is* this about? Why are you looking at this wrapper?

fields.Title: You: "Why do I even care about this?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why do I even care about this?

fields.Title: Endurance: "Your heart working overtime, trying..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your heart working overtime, trying to keep up with the panicked synapses firing all over your brain. Moving litres of blood through you, panicking.

fields.Title: You: "Cinnamon's not a fruit."
fields.Dialogue Text: Cinnamon's not a fruit.
